A4.text: An autopsy performed by the medical examiner's office found that he had an enlarged heart and advanced coronary artery disease (more than 90% narrowed) which had resulted in a sudden heart attack.

A5.text: The cause of death was officially ruled as atherosclerotic heart disease.
